##### <s class="topic-title">[[Gotu kola (Centella asiatica)]]</s>

In the [[Ayurveda|Ayurvedic]] tradition, it is used to help with [[depression]] and [[anxiety]]. 
^[[Dr. K's Guide to Mental Health](https://coaching.healthygamer.gg/guide)]
